title: Multiple Linear Regression
subject: Machine Learning
theory:
Predicting Y using multiple X variables. 
`y = b0 + b1x1 + b2x2 ...`
Challenge: **Multicollinearity** (When x1 and x2 are correlated, coefficients become unstable).

interview_questions.question: Why use Adjusted R2?
interview_questions.answer: R2 always increases when you add features (even junk ones). Adjusted R2 penalizes useless features.

real_world_use_cases.description: Price depends on SqFt, Location, Age, Rooms.
